name: R5-ServiceRequest-R4-ServiceRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 ServiceRequest into FHIR R4

element.display: A request for a service to be performed

target.display: A request for a service to be performed
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest`
R5 `ServiceRequest.asNeeded[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.asNeeded[x]`
R5 `ServiceRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.authoredOn`
R5 `ServiceRequest.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.basedOn`
R5 `ServiceRequest.bodySite` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.bodySite`
R5 `ServiceRequest.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.category`
R5 `ServiceRequest.code` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.code` - code has change due to type change: R5 code CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 code
R5 `ServiceRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.contained`

element.display: True if service/procedure should not be performed

target.display: True if service/procedure should not be performed
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.doNotPerform` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.doNotPerform`

element.display: Encounter in which the request was created

target.display: Encounter in which the request was created
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.encounter`

R5 `ServiceRequest.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: What the service request is about, when it is not about the subject of record

target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.id`
R5 `ServiceRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.implicitRules`
R5 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesCanonical` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesCanonical`
R5 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesUri` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.instantiatesUri`
R5 `ServiceRequest.insurance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.insurance`

target.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.intent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.intent` - intent has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `ServiceRequest.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

R5 `ServiceRequest.location` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationCode` - locationCode has change due to type change: R5 location CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 locationCode

R5 `ServiceRequest.location` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `ServiceRequest.locationReference` - locationReference removed a binding requirement - Example http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType; locationReference has change due to type change: R5 location CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 locationReference
R5 `ServiceRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.meta`

R5 `ServiceRequest.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `ServiceRequest.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`
R5 `ServiceRequest.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.occurrence[x]`

R5 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` - orderDetail added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/servicerequest-orderdetail; orderDetail has change due to type change: R5 orderDetail BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 orderDetail

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The parameter details for the service being requested
The detail of the order being requested
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The value for the order detail
The context of the order details by reference

target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.patientInstruction` - patientInstruction changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); patientInstruction has change due to type change: R5 patientInstruction BackboneElement has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 patientInstruction

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.performer`
R5 `ServiceRequest.performerType` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.performerType`

R5 `ServiceRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `ServiceRequest.quantity[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.quantity[x]` - quantity[x] has change due to type change: R5 `quantity[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `quantity[x]`

R5 `ServiceRequest.reason` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonCode` - reasonCode has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonCode

R5 `ServiceRequest.reason` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `ServiceRequest.reasonReference` - reasonReference removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/procedure-reason; reasonReference has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonReference
R5 `ServiceRequest.relevantHistory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.relevantHistory`
R5 `ServiceRequest.replaces` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.replaces`
R5 `ServiceRequest.requester` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.requester`
R5 `ServiceRequest.requisition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.requisition`
R5 `ServiceRequest.specimen` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.specimen`

element.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Individual or Entity the service is ordered for

target.display: Individual or Entity the service is ordered for
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.subject`

R5 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `ServiceRequest.supportingInfo` - supportingInfo has change due to type change: R5 supportingInfo CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 supportingInfo

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `ServiceRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `ServiceRequest.text`
